name: Catch'em
description: A sudden plane crash interrupts the uneventful journey of a little boy. Now stranded in the heart of the Amazonian jungle, he embarks on an eventful journey along the trails of a long-forgotten civilization, searching for the legendary city of El Dorado.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8 or 10 Processor: Pentium 1 GHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with a minimum of 64 MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 160 MB available space
